title: ‘He’s the Best I’ve Ever Raced With’: Geraint Thomas Hails Tadej Pogačar and his Giro d’Italia Supremacy
content:
'I feel every one of my 38 years': Birthday boy Thomas concedes he didn't have the legs to overhaul Martínez in Giro stage 20 podium battle, takes solace in third overall.

Read the full article at ‘He’s the Best I’ve Ever Raced With’: Geraint Thomas Hails Tadej Pogačar and his Giro d’Italia Supremacy on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
